sentences.chinese: 跳到繫泊在大船的救生筏上。

sentences.english: No suitable buoy is available today.
sentences.chinese: 今天並無合適繫泊浮泡。

sentences.english: Furthermore, the chain stopper of the mooring system is another essential design consideration.
sentences.chinese: 其中，錨鏈摯鏈器是繫泊系統中的一個重要組成部分。

sentences.english: Mooring in the mooring process staff will be given specific guidance.
sentences.chinese: 繫泊員在繫泊過程中會給予具體指導。

sentences.english: Mooring in the mooring process staff will be given specific guidance.
sentences.chinese: 繫泊員在繫泊過程中會給予具體指導。

sentences.english: The vertically loaded anchor (VLA) is a new-type drag anchor used for deepwater foundations.
sentences.chinese: 法向承力錨是一種新型的拖曳嵌入式繫泊基礎。

sentences.english: Then the dynamics process simulation for the chain tension of the mooring anchor winch can be realized.
sentences.chinese: 從而可以實現繫泊錨機的張力動態過程仿真。

sentences.english: A finite element model is established to analyze a simplified floating net cage and mooring system.
sentences.chinese: 對一種浮式網箱及其繫泊系統建立了有限元模型。

sentences.english: Mooring bollards being fabricated from steel tube and solid bar.
sentences.chinese: 繫泊柱正在編造由鋼管和固體酒吧。

sentences.english: You must moor at No. 2 jetty.
sentences.chinese: 你船必須在2號碼頭繫泊。
